name: CONTRACTED
description: The infection is spreading. Cases of outbreak are being reported across the globe! As a highly skilled agent, working for Harmond Intl, you are assigned with taking on the outbreaks head on. You must travel to various locations, from camp grounds to caves, and wipe the areas clean.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP2 or Later. Processor: SSE2 instruction set support. Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: DX9 (shader model 3.0) or DX11 with feature level 9.3 capabilities. DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 4 GB available space
